name: Singstar '80s
description: It's time to update your SingStar collection with this incredible bunch of songs from the decade of synth-pop and neon! SingStar '80's for PlayStation 2 includes ''Uptown Girl'' by Billy Joel, ''Heart of Glass'' by Blondie, ''Time After Time by Cyndi Lauper, and so much more. Channel your favorite artists like Dexy's Midnight Runners, A Flock of Seagulls, and Tears for Fears as you dance around your living room with friends and family. Sing duets, battle in head-to-head versus competitions, or just have a big team party in various singing modes. Create your very own '80s moments by recording your performance so you can play it over and over again.
